com.compendium.meeting.io
Class ArenaConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.meeting.io.ArenaConnection

public class ArenaConnection
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the connections to Arena to upload/download xml data for the meeting and getting clock offset.

Field Summary
private  int nAttempts
          Counter of how many attempts have been made to get the clock time from Arena.

Constructor. Create a new instance of XMLDataHandler.

Method Detail

getArenaOffset

public long getArenaOffset(AccessGridData oConnectionData)
Query Arena for the Arena clock time and store in triplestore. Record current time for use in calculating Compendium event offsets

uploadXMLFile

public void uploadXMLFile(AccessGridData oConnectionData,
                          java.lang.String sSessionID,
                          java.lang.String sFilePath,
                          boolean isCorrectName)
Upload file of XML export.zip with the given name to the memetic server. If upload appears successful, tag the file as uploaded by renameing file with '.uploaded' at the end.

Parameters:
oConnectionData - the object holding the connection data.
sSessionID - the session id required to make the connection.
sFilePath - the file of data to upload.
isCorrectName - indicates if the filename passed is the correct filename or if it needs altering from .n3 to zip.

downloadXMLFile

public boolean downloadXMLFile(AccessGridData oConnectionData,
                               java.lang.String sSessionID,
                               java.lang.String sFileName,
                               java.lang.String sDirectory)
Check if there is an XML zip file waiting to be download. If yes, download and unzipp and import the XML

Parameters:
oConnectionData - the object holding the connection data.
sSessionID - the session id required to make the connection.
sFileName - the filename of the file to download.
sDirectory - the path to the folder to store the downloaded file to.
